CurrentIssues.ID: MultilineLambdaItParameter:ReferralScreen.kt${ // TODO: use StateEvent if (stateHolder.errorSnackbar != null) { TangemSnackbar(data = it, actionOnNewLine = true) } else { CopiedTextSnackbar(it) } }

MultilineLambdaItParameter:ReferralScreen.kt${ ReferralContent( stateHolder = stateHolder, snackbarHostState = snackbarHostState, onAgreementClick = stateHolder.analytics.onAgreementClicked, modifier = Modifier.padding(it), ) }
